description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Monsters Elect is a 2D fantasy action game. Fight your way through a never ending stream of monsters and lead your allies in battle as you take down four mean bosses.
description.short: Monsters Elect is a 2D fantasy action game. Fight your way through a never ending stream of monsters and lead your allies in battle as you take down four mean bosses.
